text: Ricardo "Ricky" Vela is an American songwriter and keyboardist for the band Selena y Los Dinos. ==Works== Vela has either written or co-written these following songs that topped on Billboard 200, Billboard Latin Songs, and Mexican Regional Songs charts. {| class="wikitable" |- !Name of Song !Peak Position !Year |- |"Dame Un Beso" |N/A |1986 |- |"Soy Amiga" |N/A |1986 |- |"Dame Tu Amor" |31 (Billboard Hot Ringtones) 6 (Billboard Hot Latin Songs) |1986 |- |"Cuando Despierto" |N/A |1987 |- |"Tu No Sabes" |N/A |1987 |- |"Ven A Verme" |N/A |1987 |- |"Sabes" |N/A |1988 |- |"Como Te Quiero/Yo A Ti" |N/A |1988 |- |"Como Quisisera" |N/A |1988 |- |"Cariño Mio" |N/A |1988 |- |"Quisiera Darte" |N/A |1988 |- |"Tengo Ganas De Llorar" |N/A |1990 |- |"Si La Quieres" |N/A |1992 |- |"Yo Te Sigo Queriendo" |N/A |1992 |- |"Las Cadenas" |N/A |1992 |- |"No Debes Jugar" |3 (Billboard Hot Latin Tracks) 3 (Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay) 3 (Latin Pop Airplay) |1993 |- |"La Llamada" |5 (Billboard Hot Latin Tracks) 6 (Latin Regional Mexican Airplay) 8 (Latin Pop Airplay) |1993 |- |"Tu Robaste Mi Corazon" |5 (Billboard Latin Tracks) 8 (Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay) 6 (Billboard Latin Pop) |1993 |- |"No Me Queda Más" |1 (Hot Latin Tracks) 1 (Latin Regional Airplay) 13 (Latin Pop Airplay) |1994 |- |"'Fotos y Recuerdos" |1 (Hot Latin Tracks) 1 (Latin Regional Mexican Airplay) 12 (Latin Pop Airplay) |1994 |- |"El Chico del Apartamento 512" |6 (Hot Latin Charts) 7 (Latin Regional Mexican Airplay) 6 (Latin Pop Airplay) |1994 |- |"Tus Desprecios" |N/A |1994 |- |"Ya No" |N/A |1994 |- |"Fuiste Mala" |N/A |1999 |- |"Esperandote" |6 (Hot Latin Charts) 3 (Latin Pop Airplay) |1996 |} ==Awards and nominations== Ricky Vela has been nominated for seven awards and won two awards. His works include Dame Un Beso which gave him more recognition in the Tejano world. ==References== ==External links== * *Selena y Los Dinos information Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American people of Mexican descent Category:Songwriters from Texas Category:Selena y Los Dinos members Category:Living people Category:Latin music songwriters Category:21st-century American keyboardists
title: Ricky Vela
